sn42.3:4.1: Atha kho yodhājīvo gāmaṇi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn42.3:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho yodhājīvo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.3:4.4: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ yodhājīvānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.3:4.5: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.3:4.10: tatiyampi kho yodhājīvo gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn42.3:4.11: “sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante, pubbakānaṃ ācariyapācariyānaṃ yodhājīvānaṃ bhāsamānānaṃ:
sn42.3:4.12: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti.
sn42.3:5.5: Yo so, gāmaṇi, yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tassa taṃ cittaṃ pubbe gahitaṃ dukkaṭaṃ duppaṇihitaṃ:
sn42.3:5.6: ‘ime sattā haññantu vā bajjhantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesuṃ iti vā’ti.
sn42.3:5.7: Tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti;
sn42.3:5.8: so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajito nāma nirayo tattha upapajjatīti.
sn42.3:5.9: Sace kho panassa evaṃ diṭṭhi hoti:
sn42.3:5.10: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’ti, sāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi.
sn42.3:5.11: Micchādiṭṭhikassa kho panāhaṃ, gāmaṇi, purisapuggalassa dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ vadāmi—
sn42.3:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, yodhājīvo gāmaṇi parodi, assūni pavattesi.
sn42.3:6.5: “Nāhaṃ, bhante, etaṃ rodāmi yaṃ maṃ bhagavā evamāha;
sn42.3:6.6: api cāhaṃ, bhante, pubbakehi ācariyapācariyehi yodhājīvehi dīgharattaṃ nikato vañcito paluddho:
sn42.3:6.7: ‘yo so yodhājīvo saṅgāme ussahati vāyamati, tamenaṃ ussahantaṃ vāyamantaṃ pare hananti pariyāpādenti, so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā parajitānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī’”ti.
